description.name: Init
description.zh-cn: 初始化AutoItX，通常在开始使用AutoItX函数之前调用
description.en-us: Initializes the AutoItX library.

description.name: error
description.zh-cn: 获取上一次AutoItX函数调用返回的错误代码
description.en-us: Retrieves the error code from the last AutoItX function call.

description.name: AutoItSetOption
description.zh-cn: 设置AutoIt的选项，可以用来配置AutoIt的一些行为
description.en-us: Sets various options for AutoItX, such as timeout and behavior.

description.name: ClipGet
description.zh-cn: 获取剪贴板的内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the content of the Windows clipboard.

description.name: ClipPut
description.zh-cn: 将文本放入剪贴板
description.en-us: Puts text into the Windows clipboard.

description.name: ControlClick
description.zh-cn: 模拟控件的点击操作
description.en-us: Simulates a mouse click on a specified control (button, checkbox, etc.) in a window.

description.name: ControlClickByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄模拟控件的点击操作
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlClick` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlCommand
description.zh-cn: 发送命令给控件，比如选择列表中的项、设置复选框状态等
description.en-us: Sends a command to a control (button, checkbox, radio button, etc.) in a window.

description.name: ControlCommandByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄发送命令给控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlCommand` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlListView
description.zh-cn: 操作ListView控件
description.en-us: Sends commands to a ListView control (such as list items selection) in a window.

description.name: ControlListViewByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄操作ListView控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlListView` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlDisable
description.zh-cn: 禁用控件
description.en-us: Disables a control in a window.

description.name: ControlDisableByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄禁用控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlDisable` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlEnable
description.zh-cn: 启用控件
description.en-us: Enables a control in a window.

description.name: ControlEnableByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄启用控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlEnable` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlFocus
description.zh-cn: 将焦点设置到控件上
description.en-us: Sets focus to a control in a window.

description.name: ControlFocusByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄将焦点设置到控件上
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlFocus` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlGetFocus
description.zh-cn: 获取当前具有焦点的控件句柄
description.en-us: Retrieves the handle of the control with focus.

description.name: ControlGetFocusByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄获取当前具有焦点的控件句柄
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlGetFocus` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlGetHandle
description.zh-cn: 获取控件句柄
description.en-us: Retrieves the handle of a control in a window.

description.name: ControlGetHandleAsText
description.zh-cn: 获取控件句柄并返回为文本
description.en-us: Retrieves the handle of a control in a window as text.

description.name: ControlGetPos
description.zh-cn: 获取控件的位置和尺寸
description.en-us: Retrieves the position and size of a control in a window.

description.name: ControlGetPosByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄获取控件的位置和尺寸
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlGetPos` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlGetText
description.zh-cn: 获取控件的文本内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the text from a control in a window.

description.name: ControlGetTextByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄获取控件的文本内容
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlGetText` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlHide
description.zh-cn: 隐藏控件
description.en-us: Hides a control in a window.

description.name: ControlHideByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄隐藏控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlHide` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlMove
description.zh-cn: 移动控件到指定位置
description.en-us: Moves a control within a window.

description.name: ControlMoveByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄移动控件到指定位置
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlMove` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlSend
description.zh-cn: 向控件发送按键输入
description.en-us: Sends keystrokes to a control in a window.

description.name: ControlSendByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄向控件发送按键输入
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlSend` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: ControlSetText
description.zh-cn: 设置控件的文本内容
description.en-us: Sets the text of a control in a window.

description.name: ControlSetTextByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄设置控件的文本内容
description.en-us: Sets the text of a control in a window using its handle.

description.name: ControlShow
description.zh-cn: 显示控件
description.en-us: Shows a control in a window.

description.name: ControlShowByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄显示控件
description.en-us: Shows a control in a window using its handle.

description.name: ControlTreeView
description.zh-cn: 操作TreeView控件
description.en-us: Sends commands to a TreeView control in a window.

description.name: ControlTreeViewByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄操作TreeView控件
description.en-us: Same as `AU3_ControlTreeView` but uses a handle instead of window and control IDs.

description.name: DriveMapAdd
description.zh-cn: 映射本地驱动器到网络共享路径
description.en-us: Maps a network drive.

description.name: DriveMapDel
description.zh-cn: 取消驱动器映射
description.en-us: Unmaps a network drive.

description.name: DriveMapGet
description.zh-cn: 获取驱动器映射的信息
description.en-us: Retrieves the mapping of a network drive.

description.name: IsAdmin
description.zh-cn: 检查当前用户是否有管理员权限
description.en-us: Checks if the current process is running with administrative privileges.

description.name: MouseClick
description.zh-cn: 模拟鼠标点击
description.en-us: Simulates a mouse click at the current cursor position.

description.name: MouseClickDrag
description.zh-cn: 模拟鼠标点击并拖动
description.en-us: Simulates dragging the mouse between two points.

description.name: MouseDown
description.zh-cn: 模拟鼠标按下
description.en-us: Simulates pressing a mouse button.

description.name: MouseGetCursor
description.zh-cn: 获取鼠标当前的光标样式
description.en-us: Retrieves the mouse cursor's current shape.

description.name: MouseGetPos
description.zh-cn: 获取鼠标当前位置
description.en-us: Retrieves the current position of the mouse cursor.

description.name: MouseMove
description.zh-cn: 移动鼠标到指定位置
description.en-us: Moves the mouse cursor to a specified position.

description.name: MouseUp
description.zh-cn: 模拟鼠标释放
description.en-us: Simulates releasing a mouse button.

description.name: MouseWheel
description.zh-cn: 模拟鼠标滚轮滚动
description.en-us: Simulates scrolling the mouse wheel.

description.name: Opt
description.zh-cn: 设置AutoIt选项
description.en-us: Sets options for AutoItX

description.name: PixelChecksum
description.zh-cn: 获取屏幕区域的像素校验和
description.en-us: Calculates a checksum of a region of pixels on the screen.

description.name: PixelGetColor
description.zh-cn: 获取屏幕上指定位置的像素颜色
description.en-us: Retrieves the color of a pixel at a specified position.

description.name: PixelSearch
description.zh-cn: 在屏幕上搜索指定颜色的像素
description.en-us: Searches for a pixel of a specific color in a region of the screen.

description.name: ProcessClose
description.zh-cn: 关闭进程
description.en-us: Closes a specified process.

description.name: ProcessExists
description.zh-cn: 检查进程是否存在
description.en-us: Checks if a specified process exists.

description.name: ProcessSetPriority
description.zh-cn: 设置进程的优先级
description.en-us: Sets the priority of a specified process.

description.name: ProcessWait
description.zh-cn: 等待进程的出现
description.en-us: Waits for a specified process to exist.

description.name: ProcessWaitClose
description.zh-cn: 等待进程的结束
description.en-us: Waits for a specified process to close.

description.name: Run
description.zh-cn: 用于运行外部程序或执行系统命令
description.en-us: Runs an external program or opens a document.

description.name: RunWait
description.zh-cn: 运行外部程序并等待其完成
description.en-us: Runs an external program and waits for it to complete.

description.name: RunAs
description.zh-cn: 以其他用户的身份运行外部程序
description.en-us: Runs an external program with different credentials (as a different user).

description.name: RunAsWait
description.zh-cn: 以其他用户的身份运行外部程序并等待其完成
description.en-us: Runs an external program with different credentials and waits for it to complete.

description.name: Send
description.zh-cn: 向活动窗口发送按键输入
description.en-us: Sends simulated keystrokes.

description.name: Shutdown
description.zh-cn: 关闭或重启系统
description.en-us: Shuts down, restarts, or logs off the computer.

description.name: Sleep
description.zh-cn: 在脚本中加入暂停/延迟
description.en-us: Pauses the script for a specified number of milliseconds.

description.name: StatusbarGetText
description.zh-cn: 获取状态栏的文本内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the text from the status bar of a window.

description.name: StatusbarGetTextByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用控件句柄获取状态栏的文本内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the text from the status bar of a window using its handle.

description.name: ToolTip
description.zh-cn: 显示一个提示框，通常用于在屏幕上显示临时的提示信息
description.en-us: Creates a tooltip with the specified text at the current mouse position or on a specific control.

description.name: WinActivate
description.zh-cn: 激活指定的窗口
description.en-us: Activates a window by title or window handle.

description.name: WinActivateByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄激活指定的窗口
description.en-us: Activates a window using its handle.

description.name: WinActive
description.zh-cn: 检查指定的窗口是否处于活动状态
description.en-us: Checks if a window is currently active by title.

description.name: WinActiveByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄检查指定的窗口是否处于活动状态
description.en-us: Checks if a window is currently active using its handle.

description.name: WinClose
description.zh-cn: 关闭指定的窗口
description.en-us: Closes a window by title.

description.name: WinCloseByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄关闭指定的窗口
description.en-us: Closes a window using its handle.

description.name: WinExists
description.zh-cn: 检查指定的窗口是否存在
description.en-us: Checks if a window exists by title.

description.name: WinExistsByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄检查指定的窗口是否存在
description.en-us: Checks if a window exists using its handle.

description.name: WinGetCaretPos
description.zh-cn: 获取当前光标的位置
description.en-us: Retrieves the position of the caret in the active window.

description.name: WinGetClassList
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的类名列表
description.en-us: Retrieves a list of classes used by a window by title.

description.name: WinGetClassListByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的类名列表
description.en-us: Retrieves a list of classes used by a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetClientSize
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口客户区的尺寸
description.en-us: Retrieves the client area's size of a window by title.

description.name: WinGetClientSizeByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口客户区的尺寸
description.en-us: Retrieves the client area's size of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetHandle
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的句柄
description.en-us: Retrieves the handle of a window by title.

description.name: WinGetHandleAsText
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的句柄并返回为文本
description.en-us: Retrieves the handle of a window by title as text.

description.name: WinGetPos
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的位置和尺寸
description.en-us: Retrieves the position and size of a window by title.

description.name: WinGetPosByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的位置和尺寸
description.en-us: Retrieves the position and size of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetProcess
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的进程ID
description.en-us: Retrieves the process ID of a window by title.

description.name: WinGetProcessByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的进程ID
description.en-us: Retrieves the process ID of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetState
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的状态
description.en-us: Retrieves the state of a window by title (minimized, maximized, etc.).

description.name: WinGetStateByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的状态
description.en-us: Retrieves the state of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetText
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的文本内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the text from a window by title.

description.name: WinGetTextByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的文本内容
description.en-us: Retrieves the text from a window using its handle.

description.name: WinGetTitle
description.zh-cn: 获取指定窗口的标题
description.en-us: Retrieves the title of a window by title.

description.name: WinGetTitleByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄获取指定窗口的标题
description.en-us: Retrieves the title of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinKill
description.zh-cn: 强制关闭指定的窗口
description.en-us: Forces a window to close by title.

description.name: WinKillByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄强制关闭指定的窗口
description.en-us: Forces a window to close using its handle.

description.name: WinMenuSelectItem
description.zh-cn: 选择窗口的菜单项
description.en-us: Selects an item from a menu in a window by title.

description.name: WinMenuSelectItemByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄选择窗口的菜单项
description.en-us: Selects an item from a menu in a window using its handle.

description.name: WinMinimizeAll
description.zh-cn: 最小化所有窗口
description.en-us: Minimizes all windows.

description.name: WinMinimizeAllUndo
description.zh-cn: 恢复最小化的窗口
description.en-us: Undoes the effect of `AU3_WinMinimizeAll`.

description.name: WinMove
description.zh-cn: 移动指定窗口到指定位置
description.en-us: Moves and/or resizes a window by title.

description.name: WinMoveByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄移动指定窗口到指定位置
description.en-us: Moves and/or resizes a window using its handle.

description.name: WinSetOnTop
description.zh-cn: 设置指定窗口在其他窗口之上
description.en-us: Sets a window to be always on top by title.

description.name: WinSetOnTopByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄设置指定窗口在其他窗口之上
description.en-us: Sets a window to be always on top using its handle.

description.name: WinSetState
description.zh-cn: 设置指定窗口的状态（最大化、最小化、正常等）
description.en-us: Sets the state of a window by title (minimize, maximize, etc.).

description.name: WinSetStateByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄设置指定窗口的状态
description.en-us: Sets the state of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinSetTitle
description.zh-cn: 设置指定窗口的标题
description.en-us: Sets the title of a window by title.

description.name: WinSetTitleByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄设置指定窗口的标题
description.en-us: Sets the title of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinSetTrans
description.zh-cn: 设置指定窗口的透明度
description.en-us: Sets the transparency level of a window by title.

description.name: WinSetTransByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄设置指定窗口的透明度
description.en-us: Sets the transparency level of a window using its handle.

description.name: WinWait
description.zh-cn: 等待指定的窗口出现
description.en-us: Waits for a window to exist by title.

description.name: WinWaitByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄等待指定的窗口出现
description.en-us: Waits for a window to exist using its handle.

description.name: WinWaitActive
description.zh-cn: 等待指定的窗口处于活动状态
description.en-us: Waits for a window to be active by title.

description.name: WinWaitActiveByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄等待指定的窗口处于活动状态
description.en-us: Waits for a window to be active using its handle.

description.name: WinWaitClose
description.zh-cn: 等待指定的窗口关闭
description.en-us: Waits for a window to close by title.

description.name: WinWaitCloseByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄等待指定的窗口关闭
description.en-us: Waits for a window to close using its handle.

description.name: WinWaitNotActive
description.zh-cn: 等待指定的窗口不处于活动状态
description.en-us: Waits for a window to be not active by title.

description.name: WinWaitNotActiveByHandle
description.zh-cn: 使用窗口句柄等待指定的窗口不处于活动状态
description.en-us: Waits for a window to be not active using its handle.
